tool_description: Check Correos tracking code in spanish, english and french
title: Correos Tracking - Multilingual

api_list.name: EN - Get tracking Info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://correos-tracking-multilingual.p.rapidapi.com/en/track/{tracking_number}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "correos-tracking-multilingual.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
